# letterProportion function
```{r}
letterProportion <- function(string){
  tolower(string) #Put character sting in all lowercase
  small <- strsplit(string, split = "") # split up the character string into individual letters
  table(small) # make a table of those letters from the character string

  }
```


# FreqCompare function
```{r}
E <- English #Define the languages(Probably not needed?)
G <- German
Fi <- Finnish
Fr <- French
I <- Italian
S <- Spanish
freqCompare <- function(output from letterProportion, language) #Output will be a table and choose a language{
  observed <- "letter frequency from the string" #letter proportion from the character string
  language <- "language frequency" #letter proportion from the language chosen
  difference <- (observed - language)
  chisq <- ((difference^2)%%language) #Chisq test
  
  }
```

# WhichLanguage function
```{r}
whichLanguage <- function(character string as a language, list(English,German,Finnish,French,Italian,Spanish)){
  English - Chisq
  German - Chisq
  Finnish - Chisq
  French - Chisq
  Italian - Chisq
  Spanish - Chisq
  
  
  return(language #with smallest chisq)
  }
```
